sql: SELECT b.LastName AS "First name", b.FirstName AS "Last name", round(sum(a.Total), 2) AS Total, round(sum(a.Total)/50, 2) AS Discount FROM Invoice AS a JOIN Customer AS b ON (b.CustomerId = a.CustomerId) WHERE b.LastName LIKE '%{{customer}}%' GROUP BY b.LastName, b.FirstName ORDER BY b.LastName, b.FirstName;
SELECT b.name as Artist, a.Title as Album FROM Album a JOIN Artist b ON(b.ArtistId = a.ArtistId) WHERE Artist LIKE '%{{artist}}%' ORDER BY Artist, Title
